text: satyavisvasikalkk udaharanamayi allahu pharaveanre patniye etuttukanikkunnu. avar allahuveat innane prarthiccu: enre natha! enikku ninreyatutt svargattilearu vit untakkittarename! pharaveanil ninnum ayalute durvrttiyilninnum enne raksikkename! akramikalaya janattilninnum enne ni meacippikkename
